entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's school trunk was packed with his school things and all his most prized possessions — the Invisibility Cloak he had inherited from his father, the broom-stick he had gotten from Sirius, the enchanted map of Hogwarts he had been given by Fred and George Weasley last year.
